about_the_game:
This is a casual mini game where players need to use directional keys to control a car and collect gasoline on the map to increase points.


Pay attention to avoiding the bomber chasing you on the map. If the bomber encounters you, the game will end.


When a car obtains a special item, it will evolve into a tank and be in an invincible state.


Players in tank form can turn around and eat the bombers, but note that the time spent in tank form is limited.


Try to eat more gasoline and bombers to earn higher game points.
